articles.title: Framber Valdez, Houston Astros author 'special' day, striking out 20 in win over Los Angeles Angels
articles.description: The Astros frustrated star slugger Mike Trout and the Angels all day on Sunday, as Houston posted 20 strikeouts, tying an MLB record for a nine-inning game, in a series-ending victory over Los Angeles.

articles.title: J.T. Poston goes wire-to-wire to win John Deere Classic, seal spot in The Open Championship
articles.description: J.T. Poston completed a wire-to-wire victory Sunday in the John Deere Classic for his second PGA Tour title and a spot in The Open Championship.
articles.content:
SILVIS, Ill. -- J.T. Poston completed a wire-to-wire victory Sunday in the John Deere Classic for his second PGA Tour title and a spot in The Open Championship.

articles.title: Washington Nationals awaiting test results on Juan Soto's calf
articles.description: The Nationals say Juan Soto is undergoing an MRI on his calf to determine the extent of the injury suffered Sunday vs. the Marlins.
articles.content:
The Washington Nationals say slugger Juan Soto left Sunday's 7-4 loss to the Miami Marlins with a left calf injury.
According to the team, Soto was undergoing an MRI after the game to determine the … [+1397 chars]

articles.title: Nick Kyrgios, Stefanos Tsitsipas both draw fine a day after fiery third-round match at Wimbledon
articles.description: The fiery third-round match between Nick Kyrgios and Stefanos Tsitsipas at Wimbledon on Saturday has resulted in both players being fined.
articles.content:
LONDON -- The fiery third-round Wimbledon match between Nick Kyrgios and Stefanos Tsitsipas has resulted in both players being fined.

articles.title: Ryan Lochte's six Olympic silver, bronze medals put up for auction, will benefit charity
articles.description: All of Ryan Lochte's Olympic silver and bronze medals are up for auction, with the proceeds going to Jorge Nation Foundation, a charity benefitting children with terminal illnesses.
articles.content:
All of Ryan Lochte's Olympic silver and bronze medals are up for auction, with the proceeds going to a charity benefitting children.

articles.title: Sources - Chicago Bulls reach deal with veteran PG Goran Dragic
articles.description: Veteran point guard Goran Dragic has agreed to a one-year contract with the Bulls, sources confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content:
The Chicago Bulls have agreed to a one-year contract with veteran point guard Goran Dragic, sources confirmed to ESPN on Sunday.

articles.description: Jannik Sinner outdueled Carlos Alcaraz Sunday to reach his first Wimbledon quarterfinal.
articles.content:
Jannik Sinner outdueled Carlos Alcaraz in a matchup of up-and-comers Sunday to reach his first Wimbledon quarterfinal, although he needed six match points to put his opponent away.

articles.title: Zhou Guanyu's car flips over tire barrier in huge F1 crash
articles.description: The British Grand Prix was suspended before the end of the first lap after two huge collisions involving multiple drivers on the pit straight resulted in Zhou Guanyu's Alfa Romeo ending up on the wrong side of the tyre barriers at Turn 1.
